00123   template <typename ImageContainer>
00124   struct CImageContainer
00125   {
00126 
00127   public:
00128     typedef typename ImageContainer::ValueType ValueType;
00129     typedef typename ImageContainer::Iterator Iterator;
00130     typedef typename ImageContainer::ConstIterator ConstIterator;
00131     typedef typename ImageContainer::Point Point;
00132 
00133     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((boost::BidirectionalIterator<Iterator>));
00134     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((CValueType<ValueType>));
00135 
00136     BOOST_CONCEPT_USAGE(CImageContainer)
00137     {
00138       //TContainer j(a,b);
00139       it = i.begin();  // require postincrement-dereference returning value_type
00140       same_type(i(a), v);
00141 
00142       //API
00143       same_type(i.extent(), a); //get the extent
00144       i.setValue(a, v);  //set a value at a Point
00145       i.setValue(it, v); //set a value at an Iterator
00146       same_type(i.operator()(itconst), v);       // get the value from a ConstIterator
00147       same_type(i.operator()(it), v);       // get the value from a ConstIterator
00148       same_type(i.operator()(a), v);       //get the value from a point
00149 
00150     }
00151
